name: Cyberspace (Future Orb Studios)
description:
Cyberspace is a survival game in a dystopian world.

How to Play

Left and Right arrow keys, or A and D to move

Click to shoot a bullet

Destroy anything moving.

Modes

Campaign - Play through a story that each have 8 missions. After a mission is complete, you will get to see a cutscene from Cyberspace Films.

Survival - Survive through waves of enemies. There are 20 waves.

Stories

Robert's Story - You will play as Robert. You are trying to make a plan with Vic to find the CyberLord. You notice the CyberLord is 2 miles away, and you start your journey. What do you think will happen? Will he find the CyberLord?
